masayakata adhika kalayak rohale idala anthimedi dinesh awasan husma heluwa.ee masaya purama sathkam 5k oluwata karala.ee dawas tikema dinesh hellilawath naha oluwe sathkam karala thiyenne ara ibbage oluwa kapila giya paththenmayi oluwa ambanaka haralalu..dineshwa beraganna dostharalath puluwan uparime kara kiyanne(eeka nam ithin thahawuru karala kiyanna baha) ithin kastiya me siddiya kohomada dakinne?.man nam hithanne karapu pawa ewelema pala dunna kiyala.me loke api karana waradi walata aniwaryenma daduwamakuth himi.me siddiye wage ewelema palanodunnath kawada hari dawasaka ritan eka gewannama wenawa eekanthayi.
